text: Evaṃ bhāvitā kho bhikkhave ānāpānassati evaṃ bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti
edit: Evaṃ bhāvitā kho bhikkhave ānāpānassati evaṃ bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti

translations.transtext: In that way, monks, mindfulness of breathing, cultivated, in that way, having been practiced frequently, fulfills the four foundations of mindfulness.
